entities.name: dumbledore
entities.description: Dumbledore is introduced as the one giving instructions to Hagrid.

entities.name: hagrid
entities.description: Hagrid is introduced as someone who comes panting into sight with Fang at his heels.

entities.name: fang
entities.description: Fang is mentioned as being at Hagrid's heels.

entities.name: karkaroff
entities.description: Karkaroff is introduced as someone whose student has been attacked.

entities.name: moody
entities.description: Moody is introduced as someone who is limping toward them.

relationships.description: Dumbledore asks Hagrid to fetch Professor Karkaroff.
Dumbledore requests Moody to be alerted.
Hagrid is asked by Dumbledore to fetch Professor Karkaroff.
Moody responds to Dumbledore's request for notification.
